message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product and I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $200 for it. What do you think?
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to get a bit closer to my original asking price.  Would you consider $170?
Hi Alice, I appreciate your flexibility. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so how about $130?
Bob, thanks for coming up. I'm firm on getting at least $150 for this product. I'm confident it's worth it. Will you meet me at that price?
Hi Alice, I appreciate your confidence in the product, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $140. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
